title: Motley Fool Money: 06.21.2013
description: Ben Bernanke spooks investors.  Shares of Jack in the Box rise.  And Men's Wearhouse gives the boot to a retail icon.  We discuss those stories and talk emerging markets with Motley Fool Asset Management portfolio manager Bill Mann.
content:encoded: Ben Bernanke spooks investors.  Shares of Jack in the Box rise.  And Men's Wearhouse gives the boot to a retail icon.  We discuss those stories and talk emerging markets with Motley Fool Asset Management portfolio manager Bill Mann.
